MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting customers on Budworth Lane, Warrington Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:49AM. Our engineers have established that there is a faulty piece of equipment on the electrical network and that repairs will be complex. We are organising connection of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 10:30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:51PM on 14th February 2021
